data.title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Developed services which cover various areas such as machine learning model experiment platform, optical character recognition, and a virtual wallet.

Improved software development workflow in ML team projects by setting up CI/CD pipelines with test automation, writing Kubernetes deployment files, coordinating with infrastructure teams, and performing a knowledge sharing session to 50+ team members.
First-tier incident solver - investigate root causes, estimate the impact, join a conference call with infrastructure and other app teams, and perform workaround operations.
